LaGuardia Airport Hotel offers 229 guestrooms in an eight-story building. Wired and wireless Internet access (surcharge) are available, as is access through televisions via wireless keyboards (surcharge). Televisions also offer video games, premium channels, and pay movies. Rooms have desks with ergonomic chairs and recliner chairs, and two dual-line telephones, one cordless. Bathrooms contain shower/tub combinations with curved shower rods for extra elbow room and Golden Door Spa toiletries.
This Queens, NY hotel is one third mile from LaGuardia Airport. Citi Field, home of the New York Mets, is 1.5 miles from the hotel, and Midtown Manhattan is about 6 miles away.
